mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed (writer_id, contents, location) VALUES (#{userId}, #{contents}, #{location})
mapper.select: SELECT A.feed_id AS feedId, A.writer_id AS writerId, B.nm AS writerNm, B.pic AS writerPic, A.contents, A.location, A.created_at AS createdAt FROM feed A INNER JOIN user B ON A.writer_id=B.user_id ORDER BY A.created_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{len}
